Apply Now        Request Information        Events                                                              All courses in the M.S. in Integrated Marketing program are marketing focused. Students begin with a set of core courses. They then select from three concentration areas: digital marketing, brand management, or marketing analytics. To complete the degree, students take the capstone course.   The curriculum consists of 14 courses. Each course is three credits, for a total of 42 credits. All courses are offered in the evenings to accommodate the needs of working professionals and to allow full-time students to participate in internships.   Full-time students complete the degree in two years, part-time students may take up to five years to complete the course of study, depending upon the number of courses they take each semester.
